text: Eberhard Jäckel (June 29, 1929 - August 15, 2017) was a Social Democratic German historian. He was known for his studies of Adolf Hitler's role in German history. Jäckel sees Hitler as being the historical equivalent to the Chernobyl disaster.see Jäckel's essay "L'arrivé d"Hitler au pouvoir: un Tschernobly de l'histoire" from the book Weimar ou de la Démocratie en Allemagne ==References== ==Other websites== * Jäckel at Stuttgart University *Irving, Hitler and the Murder of the Jews Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German academics Category:German historians Category:People from Bremen (state) Category:People from Prussia Category:University of Florida alumni
title: Eberhard Jäckel
